name: Websoul Social Media
tag_list: social-media, social-marketing, facebook-marketing, facebook-app, facebook-developer, fanpage, social-site
description: Social media that helps you meet goals
overview:
At Websoul we meet every of our clients and learn in what environment he works at. We learn who are his clients and with who client’s company competes. We find out what is the biggest strength of the client’s company and what client needs.

We use this information to choose the right social media solutions. We focus on social media marketing, use Twitter, Facebook depending on the needs of the client.

Than we propose a solution to the problems of client, and after polishing the project and client agreement, we execute promotions,events and other types of activities and report back results of our efforts to the client.

We provide solutions for big and medium companies, but also are engadged in using social media to promote small companies from the start.
